name: Iron Grip
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Twisting metal attempts to entrap a target creature within range that you can see. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or be restrained. A creature restrained this way is trapped by the metal - damage it takes is evenly split between itself and the metal.

If cast for 2 or 3 AP, metal fills all empty spaces within a 5 or 10 foot radius of the target, respectively.

Metal created by this spell has AC 10 and 40 hit points. It remains until destroyed.
empower: The metal gains 5 damage reduction and becomes AC 18.
